name: Network Maintenance in data center
content:
Our infrastructure provider Digital Ocean, is going to perform an upgrade of core networking equipment to improve performance and reliability for our Frankfurt (Germany) data center.

Expected Impact: 

There will be several minutes of packet loss while they shift traffic between redundant devices. There may be additional event processing delays.

Service impacted: admin interface, Community, site search, timing reports on status page.

updates.content:
Expected Impact:

There will be several minutes of packet loss while they shift traffic between redundant devices. There may be additional event processing delays.

Service impacted: admin interface, Community, site search, timing reports on status page.
Everything is completed and we didn't experience any significant outage.
